title: Something Painful This Way Comes
description: Something Painful This Way Comes is one man’s reflections through the valley of the shadow of death. It is an honest and heartfelt book of suffering, endurance, doubt, faith and the inestimable kindness of God.	Topics include:		“Why is this happening to me?”		“Why do bad things happen to good people?”		“Where is God in the midst of my pain?”		“Does God really answer prayer?”		“What about healing?”		“What healing can never accomplish.”		“How can I best handle suffering?”	Also included is a journaling section at the end of the book for the reader to process their own doubts and struggles in suffering using verses from the Book of Psalms as a guide.
author: Timothy   James
